plot: Don't take life too serious, relax, let your hair down. Andre and Paris are two strangers who mistakenly swap identical phones during a confrontational encounter in a restaurant.
title: Let Your Hair Down
plot_es: Don't take life too serious, relax, let your hair down. Andre and Paris are two strangers who mistakenly swap identical phones during a confrontational encounter in a restaurant.
plot_en: Don't take life too serious, relax, let your hair down. Andre and Paris are two strangers who mistakenly swap identical phones during a confrontational encounter in a restaurant.
